item.title: Sarajevo Fest Director on Current Wave of Southeast European Cinema and Bringing in Stars
item.description: Jovan Marjanović previews the 31st edition of the fest in the capital of Bosnia and Herzegovina.

item.title: British Tough Guy Ray Winstone to Receive Sarajevo Festival Award
item.description: The ‘Sexy Beast’ and ‘Gentlemen’ star will receive the Honorary Heart of Sarajevo at the 31st Sarajevo Film Festival.
